content: juncture by plucky knitter simple and polished with its garter brim faux seam and neatly placed crown decreases that offer the perfect amount of slouch this hat and don t forget the mitts will keep you cozy and stylish as you head out for the day specs & tools finished measurements hat approx 20 / 51 cm circumference x 9 / 23 cm tall mitts approx 8 / 20 5 cm circumference x 6 5 / 16 5 cm tall yarn hat approx 135 yds / 123 m of worsted weight yarn mitts approx 85 yds / 77 m of worsted weight yarn cover samples featured in 2 skeins of plucky knitter halo worsted 100% cashmere 115 yd / 105 m per 60 g in royal icing for hat 1 skein of plucky knitter halo worsted 100% cashmere 115 yd / 105 m per 60 g in royal icing for mitts back page sample featured in 2 skeins of plucky knitter halo worsted 100% cashmere 115 yd / 105 m per 60 g in hoodie other recommended plucky knitter bases groovy primo aran scholar snug worsted trusty yakpaca gauge 18 sts and 30 rnds = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette stitch needles needles listed is suggested always take time to swatch gauge needle hat size us 7 4 5 mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle and dpns double pointed needles mitts size us 7 4 5 mm dpns smaller needle hat size us 5 3 75 mm 16 / 40 cm circular needle mitts size us 5 3 75 mm dpns tools stitch marker removable stitch marker for mitts and tapestry needle notes hat is knit in-the-round from the bottom up mitts are knit in-the-round from the cuff to thumb hole then knit flat for thumb hole then knit in-the-round to end juncture » version 1 2 www thepluckyknitter com directions - hat with 16 smaller circular needles co 92 sts using the directions - mitts long-tail method pm on right needle and join sts to begin left mitt working in-the-round being careful not to twist sts with smaller dpns co 36 sts using the long-tail method distribute sts evenly among the dpns and join sts to begin brim working in-the-round being careful not to twist sts use a round 1 k to end removable stitch marker to indicate beginning of the round round 2 p to end repeat rnds 1-2 until brim measures approx 1 from co edge round 1 k to end ending on round 2 round 2 p to end repeat rnds 1-2 until cuff measures approx 1 from co edge change to 16 circular gauge needle ending on round 2 body change to gauge dpns next round p4 k to end repeat last round until hat measures approximately 7 5 from next round k7 p4 k to marker co edge repeat last round until mitt measures approximately 4 from co edge crown shaping next round p4 *k2tog k6 repeat from * to end thumb
